name: Punishments Report
query:
select p.employee as 'كود الموظف::120', p.employee_name as 'إسم الموظف::300', 
e.designation as 'الوظيفة::300', p.posting_date as 'تاريخ الحركة::120', p.punishment_name as 'الجزاء::500'
from `tabEmployee Punishment` p
left join `tabEmployee` e on e.name=p.employee
where p.docstatus=1 and p.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and p.posting_date<=%(to_date)s 
and p.employee in (select name from `tabEmployee` where company=%(company)s and business_unit=%(business_unit)s)
order by p.posting_date,employee
